home.title: Make A New Adventure With
home.description: Trollii helps you plan your trip easily. Now by just a few clicks, you can travel the world, book a hotel, and enjoy your traveling experience. It's time to fasten your seat belt!

personalDetails.updateInfo: Update your info and personal details
personalDetails.requestDataDesc: We’ll create a file for you to download your personal details
personalDetails.deactivateAccountDesc: This will deactivate your account temporarily until whenever you come back
personalDetails.deleteAccountDesc: This will permanently delete your account and your data

tabs.programContentDescription: This is the content for the Program tab.

touristQuestions.touristQuestions: What tourists ask about the tour
touristQuestions.hotelTransfersDescription: Hotel transfers are included in the price of this tour, however you can set your hotel location in advance. In this case a tour operator representative will be at the hotel to pick you up. All you need to do is just to set the hotel location in the checkout page which we’ll ask you to put your location.
touristQuestions.cancellationPolicyDescription: You can cancel up to 24 hours in advance of the experience for a full refund.
touristQuestions.fullRefund: For a full refund, you must cancel at least 24 hours before the experience’s start time
touristQuestions.partialRefund: If you cancel less than 24 hours before the experience’s start time, the amount you paid will not be refunded
touristQuestions.noChangesAccepted: Any changes made less than 24 hours before the experience’s start time will not be accepted

reviews.email_note: Your email address will not be displayed to others
reviews.reviewTextShort: One of the best experiences I've ever had. Lots of fun, and very interesting places to see and learning about. Our spectacular guide, one of the best made us feel part of his family, very respectful and wise, answered any doubt or question we had, really a great help at all times....
reviews.reviewTextFull: One of the best experiences I've ever had. Lots of fun, and very interesting places to see and learning about. Our spectacular guide, one of the best made us feel part of his family, very respectful and wise, answered any doubt or question we had, really a great help at all times. I highly recommend this tour and especially our guide Phoebe, We had a 22 hour layover in Cairo and wanted to do a tour of the top sites. Zenab was our guide and she was absolutely fantastic! Went hit the sites we wanted to and she had great knowledge of everything! Would definitely recommend

questions.what_tourists_ask: What tourists ask about the tour
questions.hotel_transfers_description: Hotel transfers are included in the price of this tour, however you can set your hotel location in advance. In this case, a tour operator representative will be at the hotel to pick you up. All you need to do is just to set the hotel location in the checkout page which we’ll ask you to put your location.
questions.accessibility_staff_description: Yes, we offer accessibility staff to assist individuals with disabilities during the tour. Please inform us in advance about any specific requirements.
